bibl.title: New Old Posidippus and Old New Posidippus: From Occasion to Edition in the Epigrams.
bibl.note: The century of papyrology and the new Posidippus. - The Milan epigrams as subliterary compositions. - The Milan subtitles and hellenistic theory of genre. - Another subliterary anthology of Posidippus' epigrams [P. Paris Louvre Inv. E 7172 = P. Didot 28-34 (= Pack2 1435)]. - Posidippus old and new. - Epigram, occasion and edition.
